# cockroachdb_database (Resource)

Manages a database.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cockroachdb_database" "test_database" {
  name = "test_database"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the database

### Optional

- `owner` (String) Owner of the database

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the database
